Class College

  • java.lang.Object
    • College

  • public class College
extends java.lang.Object
    The College Class represents a college object, where a list of students will attend and a library object within the college. This is used so that the student objects can attend a college.
    Version:
    4.1.2
    Author:
    Bayley Cowen-Seagrove

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      College(int numberOfStudents, int numberOfTextbooks)
      Constructor for objects of class College, used to initialize College objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void describe()
      Describe method that represents the college in terms of number of students, number of textbooks available in the library.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method to allow class to be run from command line
      void runCollege(int nSteps)
      runCollege method takes input of number of steps from the user, then runs the describe and nextStep() methods that many times returning the currentStep to the user.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • College

        public College(int numberOfStudents,
               int numberOfTextbooks)
        Constructor for objects of class College, used to initialize College objects.
        Parameters:
        numberOfStudents - integer to represent the number of students in the college.
        numberOfTextbooks - integer to represent the number of textbook in the college library

    • Method Detail

      • describe

        public void describe()
        Describe method that represents the college in terms of number of students, number of textbooks available in the library.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method to allow class to be run from command line
        Parameters:
        args - array of strings used to allow parameter values to be passed to the program

      • runCollege

        public void runCollege(int nSteps)
        runCollege method takes input of number of steps from the user, then runs the describe and nextStep() methods that many times returning the currentStep to the user.
        Parameters:
        nSteps - integer user input to specify the number of times method is run
